Zombies.name: Zombie
Zombies.description: A creature with pearly, milky skin and crazy diseased eyes stumbles toward you.

Zombies.name: Zombie
Zombies.description: A creature with pearly, milky skin and crazy diseased eyes stumbles toward you.

Zombies.name: Bag boy Zombie
Zombies.description: A diseased bag boy hovers by a checkout kiosk drooling and staring at nothing.

Zombies.name: Ultimate Zombie Boss
Zombies.description: A powerful zombie, large from consuming others. You assume this was the initial zombie that began the plague.

Zombies.name: Monkey Zombie
Zombies.description: Somehow a monkey got turned into a zombie? Anyway, it is blocking the police station entrance.

Zombies.name: Teacher Zombie
Zombies.description: A teacher who must have been bitten by a zombie. It stumbles with it's mouth gaping open around the school halls.
